title: What is the Rome tennis schedule?
description: Two quarter-finals at the Internazionali BNL d’Italia will take place on Thursday in Rome. Jannik Sinner takes a 3-0 Lexus ATP Head2Head lead into his clash with Casper Ruud on Campo Centrale not before 7 p.m. CEST/1 p.m. EDT. Tommy Paul and Hubert Hurkacz kickstart the day's action. View Thursday's full order of play below. ORDER OF PLAY - THURSDAY, 15 MAY 2025 Campo Centrale - start 13:00 ATP - [30] Hubert Hurkacz (POL) vs [11] Tommy Paul (USA) Not Before 15:00 WTA - [6] Jasmine Paolini (ITA) vs Peyton Stearns (USA) Not Before 19:00 ATP - [1] Jannik Sinner (ITA) vs [6] Casper Ruud (NOR) Not Before 20:30 WTA - [8] Qinwen Zheng (CHN) vs [4] Coco Gauff (USA) SuperTennis Arena - start 13:00 WTA - Ulrikke Eikeri (NOR) / Eri Hozumi (JPN) vs Storm Hunter (AUS) / Ellen Perez (AUS) WTA - [8] Asia Muhammad (USA) / Demi Schuurs (NED) vs Veronika Kudermetova / Elise Mertens (BEL) ATP - [4] Marcel Granollers (ESP) / Horacio Zeballos (ARG) vs Joe Salisbury (GBR) / Neal Skupski (GBR) ATP - [1] Marcelo Arevalo (ESA) / Mate Pavic (CRO) vs [7] Christian Harrison (USA) / Evan King (USA) [NEWSLETTER FORM]

html:
Rome

Sinner vs. Ruud, Paul vs. Hurkacz in Thursday's quarter-finals

May 14, 2025

Getty Images

The Internazionali BNL d'Italia runs from 7-18 May. By ATP Staff

Two quarter-finals at the Internazionali BNL d’Italia will take place on Thursday in Rome. Jannik Sinner takes a 3-0 Lexus ATP Head2Head lead into his clash with Casper Ruud on Campo Centrale not before 7 p.m. CEST/1 p.m. EDT. Tommy Paul and Hubert Hurkacz kickstart the day's action.

{{player.PlayerCountryCode}}

{{player.Record}}

{{opponent.Record}}

{{opponent.PlayerCountryCode}}

View Thursday's full order of play below.

ORDER OF PLAY - THURSDAY, 15 MAY 2025
Campo Centrale - start 13:00
ATP - [30] Hubert Hurkacz (POL) vs [11] Tommy Paul (USA)

Not Before 15:00
WTA - [6] Jasmine Paolini (ITA) vs Peyton Stearns (USA)

Not Before 19:00
ATP - [1] Jannik Sinner (ITA) vs [6] Casper Ruud (NOR)

Not Before 20:30
WTA - [8] Qinwen Zheng (CHN) vs [4] Coco Gauff (USA)

SuperTennis Arena - start 13:00
WTA - Ulrikke Eikeri (NOR) / Eri Hozumi (JPN) vs Storm Hunter (AUS) / Ellen Perez (AUS)
WTA - [8] Asia Muhammad (USA) / Demi Schuurs (NED) vs Veronika Kudermetova / Elise Mertens (BEL)
ATP - [4] Marcel Granollers (ESP) / Horacio Zeballos (ARG) vs Joe Salisbury (GBR) / Neal Skupski (GBR)
ATP - [1] Marcelo Arevalo (ESA) / Mate Pavic (CRO) vs [7] Christian Harrison (USA) / Evan King (USA)
